QuestData.Title: Terror of Nagrand
QuestData.Description: <The body of a fallen soldier lies here. Blood and gore trail back from the corpse to the entrance of the cave just to the north.>$B$B<Judging by the howls and the carnage surrounding the den, something truly terrifying must be in there.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Get Shagor's Collar. Don't let the fallen soldier's death have been in vain.
QuestData.RewardText: That's the beast's collar? I heard its howls all the way over here!
